name: NecroDefender
description:
You are a humble servant of a powerful necromancer who is under attack from a rival necromancer that has sent their undead army to storm your master's keep!

Use the power of necromancy to destroy the enemy and turn them into your own fighting structures to defend your master's domain!

CONTROLS:

WASD: movement

Mouse: aim

Left Mouse Button: shoot

Gameplay:   

  • Enemies will visit the four corners of the map and then descend onto the keep to destroy it. If the keep takes enough damage, you lose. 
  • Enemies destroyed by the player will become towers
  • Enemies destroyed by towers will simply die

This game was created in a week's time for SODORJAM 2022! It also happens to be my first game I've ever made, thank you for checking it out!
